No sightings of missing ketch: Owner contemplates court action https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/no-sightings-of-missing-missing-missing-ketch-owner-comtemplates-court-action/jw3xbboujjjanpzflydeh65p6m/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/no-sightings-of-missing-missing-missing-ketch-owner-comtemplates-court-action/jw3xbboujjjanpzflydeh65p6m/ Sarah CurtisA ketch left to drift on police instructions during a rescue last year remains missing. Tue, 04 Feb 2025 17:00:00 +0000 The whereabouts of Jabe Carey's 15.85m double-masted, steel-hulled ketch remain a mystery, as there've been no reported sightings of the vessel since police left it unoccupied and unsecured during a rescue mission conducted on December 2 last year.
